body_html:
Because we have three flags to control the use of cuda, see the CMakeLists.txt:

cmake_dependent_option(
WITH_CUDA "Legacy CUDA" ON
"USE_CUDA" OFF)
cmake_dependent_option(
NO_CUDA "Legacy no CUDA" OFF
"USE_CUDA" ON)

CUDA is super important to us, but I hope everyone agrees it is a bit too much. Other flags are similar with duplicated USE and WITH and NO versions.

Plan on record is to move all of them to USE_ at least on the cmake side, cc @orionr.

@soumith, would setup.py want to keep NO_* syntax or USE_* syntax? I am ok with either, and essentially someone needs to set up the bridges.
